comments:
build I20030710

Saw this in some console output Steve asked me to look at.
Sorry, not sure how it was generated.

LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/eclipse-SDK-I20030710-linux-gtk exec
/usr/local/eclipse-SDK-I20030710-linux-gtk/eclipse -data /home/bill/eclipse -vm
/opt/sun-jdk-1.4.1.03/bin/java -vmargs -Xmx512m
-Xbootclasspath/p:/usr/local/eclipse-SDK-I20030710-linux-gtk/plugins/org.apache.xerces_4.0.13/xercesImpl.jar:/usr/local/eclipse-SDK-I20030710-linux-gtk/plugins/org.apache.xerces_4.0.13/xmlParserAPIs.jar
java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
	at java.util.AbstractList$Itr.checkForComodification(AbstractList.java:444)
	at java.util.AbstractList$Itr.next(AbstractList.java:417)
	at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.javaeditor.CompilationUnitDocumentProvider$CompilationUnitAnnotationModel.endReporting(CompilationUnitDocumentProvider.java:450)
	at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.JavaModelManager$PerWorkingCopyInfo.endReporting(JavaModelManager.java:550)
	at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.CompilationUnit.buildStructure(CompilationUnit.java:142)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.Openable.generateInfos(Openable.java:198)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.JavaElement.openWhenClosed(JavaElement.java:448)
	at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.CompilationUnit.makeConsistent(CompilationUnit.java:937)
	at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.ReconcileWorkingCopyOperation.executeOperation(ReconcileWorkingCopyOperation.java:48)
	at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.JavaModelOperation.execute(JavaModelOperation.java:365)
	at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.JavaModelOperation.run(JavaModelOperation.java:704)
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.JavaElement.runOperation(JavaElement.java:484)
	at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.CompilationUnit.reconcile(CompilationUnit.java:1049)
	at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.core.CompilationUnit.reconcile(CompilationUnit.java:1026)
	at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.text.java.JavaReconcilingStrategy.reconcile(JavaReconcilingStrategy.java:72)
	at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui.text.java.JavaReconcilingStrategy.reconcile(JavaReconcilingStrategy.java:99)
	at org.eclipse.jface.text.reconciler.MonoReconciler.process(MonoReconciler.java:76)
	at
org.eclipse.jface.text.reconciler.AbstractReconciler$BackgroundThread.run(AbstractReconciler.java:189)

This can only happen if a thread different from the UI thread or the 
reconciling thread calls reconcile on a compilation unit so that a second 
beginReporting is called before endReporting has been called.
IMPORTANT: Fix must also be ported CompilationUnitDocumentProvider2 (see bug 43029)

Described scenario can only happen if the caller of IWorkingCopy.reconcile 
does not aquire a lock for the working copy prior to the call. There have been 
a couple of places that did not adhere to that rule. Fixed. Build > 20030915.
Verified in the code using build input for I20031008.
*** Bug 46195 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 46657 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
